title: Normal People
author: Sally Rooney
description: Follows the relationship between Marianne and Connell, as they navigate the social and cultural challenges of growing up in Ireland.

title: A Gentleman in Moscow
author: Amor Towles
description: Count Rostov is sentenced to house arrest in the Metropol Hotel in Moscow, where he forms friendships and experiences the political and social changes of early 20th century Russia.

title: Into the Wild
author: Jon Krakauer
description: Follows the journey of Christopher McCandless, who hitchhiked to Alaska to live in the wilderness, and died there four months later.

title: It Ends With Us
author: Collin Hoover
description: Lily falls in love with Ryle, but discovers he has a violent side. She must choose between her love for him and her own safety.

title: Of Mice and Men
author: John Steinbeck
description: Follows the story of two migrant workers, George and Lennie, and their dreams of owning their own farm.

title: The Secret History
author: Donna Tart
description: A group of college students become entangled in a murder plot, and must confront the consequences of their actions.

title: The Wind-Up Bird Chronicle
author: Haruki Murakami
description: Toru Okada searches for his missing wife, and discovers a world of mysterious characters and strange happenings.

title: Your Neighbour's Wife
author: Tony Parsons
description: A psychological thriller about a man who starts an affair with his neighbor's wife, only to find himself caught in a dangerous web of deceit and manipulation.

title: City Of Bones
author: Michael Connelly
description: A gritty detective novel about a Los Angeles homicide detective who investigates the murder of a young girl and uncovers a dark conspiracy involving corruption and betrayal.

title: Interesting Times
author: Terry Pratchett
description: A hilarious fantasy novel about the misadventures of a bumbling wizard who inadvertently gets caught up in a revolution in a distant land.

title: Seven Husbands Of Evelyn Hugo
author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
description: A poignant romance novel about a Hollywood icon who reveals the secrets of her life and loves to a young journalist.

title: The Night Watchman
author: Louise Erdrich
description: A powerful historical novel based on the true story of the author's grandfather, who fought to save his tribe's land from being taken by the US government in the 1950s.

title: The Midnight Library
author: Matt Haig
description: A heartwarming and life-affirming story about a woman who gets a chance to try out all the different paths her life could have taken.

title: The Vanishing Half
author: Brit Bennett
description: A stunning novel about twin sisters who run away from their small, black community in the South and live very different lives, but whose fates are ultimately intertwined.

title: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
description: A gripping and shocking psychological thriller about a woman who shoots her husband and then refuses to speak, and the therapist who tries to unravel the mystery of why she did it.
